bibl.title: A Demotic Precursor to Arabic 'In Shaa Allah'.
Acts of the Tenth International Congress of Demotic Studies. Leuven, 26-30 August 2008.

bibl.note: Edition of O. Cair. Inv. 91282 (temporary number 5). Kom El-Sultan (Abydos), 12 January 190 BC. Letter from a priestly archive, using the phrase 'in the hand of God'. Parallels in demotic and Greek letters.
bibl.seg: Maha Akeel, A Demotic Precursor to Arabic 'In Shaa Allah'.

Mark Depauw & Yanne Broux (edd.), Acts of the Tenth International Congress of Demotic Studies. Leuven, 26-30 August 2008 = Orientalia Lovaniensia Analecta. 231 (Leuven - Paris - Walpole, MA, 2014) pp. 1-5, 1 pl.

Edition of O. Cair. Inv. 91282 (temporary number 5). Kom El-Sultan (Abydos), 12 January 190 BC. Letter from a priestly archive, using the phrase 'in the hand of God'. Parallels in demotic and Greek letters.
